name: Armaan Tobaccowalla
bio: Hi, I'm Armaan! I'm a sophomore studying computer science and finance and am the Team Lead for [Platform](https://platform.pennlabs.org/). I'm super interested in Sysadmin and DevOps. If you want to know more about me or any of my recent projects, check out [my website](https://armaan.tobaccowalla.com/)!
